    public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Game class manages the two Player

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game(Mode mode,
            int difficulty,
            GameType gameType,
            double duration)
        Game constructor creates the two Players object depending on the Mode parameter and launch the Game
        Parameters:
        mode - mode of the Game (HH, HA, AA)
        difficulty - difficulty of the game
        gameType - type of the game (NORMAL, TOURNAMENT)
        duration - duration of a round

        Parameters:
        joueur - checks if joueur has won or not
        Returns:
        true if the player has won, else false
